data.comment: The match has started.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Maritimo needs to be cautious. Farense have an attacking throw-in.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Maritimo in Faro.
Jean Irmer (Maritimo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Farense.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Throw-in Maritimo.
In the minute 7, Hugo Miguel awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
Can Maritimo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Farense's half?
In the minute 9, Maritimo have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Bilel Aouacheria gives Farense a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Ryan Gauld.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Throw-in for Maritimo close to the penalty box.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
In the minute 14, Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 15, Maritimo are pushing forward but Jorge Correa's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Maritimo takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 18, Lucas Africo's header is off-target for Maritimo.
Hugo Miguel has awarded Maritimo a corner.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Maritimo in the half of Farense.
Hugo Miguel signals a Maritimo throw-in in Farense's half.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Maritimo are coming forward and Claudio Winck gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
In the minute 23, Maritimo are in shooting range from this free kick.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 25, Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a throw-in for Farense, close to Maritimo's area.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Maritimo pushes forward through Pedro Pelagio, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Maritimo.
Throw-in for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Farense.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 32, In Faro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Farense.
Amine Oudrhiri (Farense) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 34, Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Faro.
In the minute 36, Hugo Miguel signals a Farense throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Free kick Farense.
Farense drives forward and Ryan Gauld gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Maritimo close to the penalty box.
Hugo Miguel awards Farense a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Maritimo are whistled for offside.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabricio Isidoro is booked for the home team.
Hugo Miguel awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Milson (Maritimo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Fabricio Isidoro for Farense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 44, Fabricio Isidoro is back on the pitch.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Patrick for Farense is whistled offside.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Patrick (Farense) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Jean Cleber is on a sub for Pedro Pelagio for Maritimo.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Hugo Miguel awards Farense a goal kick.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Maritimo.
Farense to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Goal kick for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the away team in Faro.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rafik Guitane (Maritimo) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 57, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Jean Cleber (Maritimo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Rodrigo Pinho equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Claudio Winck instrumental with a fine assist.
An attacking Farense player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 62, Jean Cleber (Maritimo) gets a yellow card.
Ryan Gauld converts the penalty to give Farense a 2-1 lead.
Hugo Miguel awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Farense.
In the minute 66, Maritimo needs to be cautious. Farense have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Milson has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
In the minute 68, Amine Oudrhiri is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Francois Xavier Fumu Tamuzo is replacing Rafik Guitane for the away team.
Maritimo make their third substitution with Ali Alipour replacing Jorge Correa.
In the minute 70, Hugo Miguel signals a Maritimo throw-in in Farense's half.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Farense.
Farense's Amine Oudrhiri is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the home team in Faro.
The home team replace Patrick with Pedro Henrique.
Throw-in for Farense in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Can Maritimo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Farense's half?
Maritimo drive upfield and Ali Alipour gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Farense defender.
Amine Oudrhiri is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Amine Oudrhiri for Farense is back on the field again.
In the minute 77, The home team replace Hugo Seco with Brian Mansilla.
Maritimo drive into the zone and Jean Irmer is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 78, Hugo Miguel awards Farense a goal kick.
Farense takes a corner from the right.
Hugo Miguel awards the home team a throw-in.
Farense drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 81, Edgar Costa is on a sub for Claudio Winck for Maritimo.
Joel is replacing Jean Irmer for the away team.
In the minute 83, Maritimo push upfield and Joel gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Farense defence.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Ali Alipour (Maritimo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
Farense make their third substitution with Lica replacing Ryan Gauld.
Farense make their fourth substitution with Ricardo Ferreira replacing Bilel Aouacheria.
In the minute 85, Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
Maritimo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Farense.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Farense.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
In the minute 88, Edgar Costa is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a Maritimo throw-in in Farense's half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hugo Miguel awards the away team a throw-in.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Faro.
Throw-in Maritimo.
Hugo Miguel awards Farense a goal kick.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Maritimo's Joel is on target but unsuccessful.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Rafael Defendi (Farense) has received a first yellow card.
Pedro Henrique (Farense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
